name: Another Ninja
description:
What would The Last Ninja look like if it was re-made today? Perhaps something like this!

The game tries to retain the feel of the old games, while removing most of the annoyances those games had.

This is a single level proof of concept, to see how it would look and play. The level can be completed very quickly.

Single player. Can be played with a keyboard or game pad. Only for Windows at the moment.
